Name: Until the Night
About the game: Until the Night is a small economic strategy game that was inspired by Anno and Tropico game series. The main goal is to build a Santa Claus toy factory and produce toys and coal. To do so Player will need to complete several tasks by gathering resources and building different factories that produce these goods. After completing each task, Player will be reworded with new buildings. The game will takes two to four hours to complete. Features: • Construction and production, which changes as you progress through the game; • Events that can both give resources or take something; • Resources and carts - if it take too much time, you can speed up the game; • Dynamic snow; • Event-based upgrades of buildings and the main building appearance; • Time limited main missions where player should produce toys.
